subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: On a fast new surface at Darlington Raceway, 41 of 44 drivers broke the qualifying record on Friday night. Greg Biffle set the pace with a lap of 179.442 miles an hour to win the pole for Saturday night’s race. The previous record was 173.797 m.p.h. by Ward Burton in 1996. Track officials spent $7 million in the off-season to smooth out the surface of the egg-shaped, 1.366-mile superspeedway.
